description: T.2993 Ash (RBK.37.03 T.12) - 1-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.2992 Lime (RBK.37.03 T.13) - Deadwood.T.2989 Oak (RBK.37.03 T.16) - 1-2m lateral reduction to suitable growth points providing 2m clearance from building & reduce south primary branch by 1-2m to appropriate side growth point.T.2998 Lime (RBK.37.03 T.7) - Crown lift to 3m from ground level.T.2549 Sycamore (RBK.37.03 T.2) - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.
